abstract: Microsoft reverses its slide in search share by offering a contest. The second notable development in the Web measuring front is an announcement by Nielsen/NetRatings that it will put more emphasis on reporting the time users spend on each page, rather than counting page views
snippet: Microsoft reverses its slide in search share by offering a contest. The second notable development in the Web measuring front is an announcement by Nielsen/NetRatings that it will put more emphasis on reporting the time users spend on each page, r...
lead_paragraph: On the Web, companies’ fortunes are measured and minted by the eyeballs. So it’s worth noting two developments today on the eyeball front.
